item.description:
Join us on Tuesday January 11, 2011 at Verona Restaurant , 18 Mt Auburn St in Watertown for a great networking event! We are looking forward to a new year and have a series of presentations coming up over the next few months, along with our social and professional networking events as well!

This Tuesday Night...

6-7 "Networlding" - Meet and Greet with Local Business Professionals hosted by Networlding Expert Doreen Nicastro
7-8 Presentation -We are happy to have Deb DiBiasie -Internet master mind who will share her insights on "Pages and Places".

If you have any questions - you can contact Dimitry at 617 680 7431

Bring a friend, a smile, a plenty of business cards!
item.name: Networking Event & "Google Places" Presentation
